Sister of Silence Eris: Sign of the Holy storing the Hall of Solina, consists of 4 Guardians and 4 Sentry Stones. The guards have been blessed - while working Security Stones, they are invulnerable. To defeat them, you must remove the 4 Sentry Stones. This is a difficult, but the other way to meet Solina not.
